smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function load appears to be too complex.
The function shouldShowAddTransferFab appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function goToFile appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function onAttachFragment appears to be too complex.
The function onCreateView appears to be too complex.
The function onCreateView appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class PutioActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class FileDetailsFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'PutioActivity' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Analytics' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'TransfersFragment' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'FilesFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'FileListFragment' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'FileDownloadDao' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'FileListAdapter' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function goToFile is nested too deeply.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface FileDownloadDao is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreateView is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function newInstance has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: EmptyIfBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: EmptyDefaultConstructor
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: An empty default constructor can be removed.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.
RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: PrintStackTrace
smells.description: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

instances.message: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.
Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.
Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.
Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming
smells.description: Function parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'FileDownloadMaintenance.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'FileDownloadsMaintenanceService'.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.
Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.
Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.
Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.
Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.
Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (intent.extras?.containsKey(EXTRA_PRECHOSEN_DESTINATION_FOLDER)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: intent.extras?.containsKey(EXTRA_PRECHOSEN_DESTINATION_FOLDER)
Parentheses in (i * layerOffset) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: i * layerOffset
Parentheses in (i * layerElevation) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: i * layerElevation
Parentheses in (contentType == CONTENT_TYPE_FOLDER) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: contentType == CONTENT_TYPE_FOLDER
Parentheses in (contentType.startsWith("video")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: contentType.startsWith("video")
Parentheses in (contentType == "video/mp4") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: contentType == "video/mp4"
Parentheses in (!firstAccessedAt.isNullOrEmpty()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !firstAccessedAt.isNullOrEmpty()
Parentheses in (it is FolderResponse && it.fresh) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it is FolderResponse && it.fresh
Parentheses in (pages.size - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: pages.size - 1
Parentheses in (pages.size - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: pages.size - 1
Parentheses in (FileDownload::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: FileDownload::class
Parentheses in (itemId != -1L) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: itemId != -1L
Parentheses in (checkedIds.contains(itemId)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: checkedIds.contains(itemId)
